snippet: Newly released papers underscored what a pivotal force Hillary Rodham Clinton was in her husband’s White House, intimately involved in the policy and politics that shaped Washington in the 1990s.
abstract: National Archives release of previously withheld memos, transcripts and other papers from Clinton White House underscores what a pivotal force Hillary Clinton was, intimately involved in the politics that shaped Washington in the 1990s; memos offer rare and more detailed look at the machinations from an era that are now of acute interest, as Clinton possibly gears up for presidential run in 2016.

byline.original: By PETER BAKER and AMY CHOZICK
byline.contributor: Peter Baker reported from Washington, and Amy Chozick from New York. Jackie Calmes and Michael D. Shear contributed reporting from Washington, and Sarah Cohen from New York. Kitty Bennett contributed research.

lead_paragraph: Newly released papers underscored what a pivotal force Hillary Rodham Clinton was in her husband’s White House, intimately involved in the policy and politics that shaped Washington in the 1990s.

headline.main: Thousands of Bill Clinton White House Papers Released
headline.print_headline: Clinton Memos Offer Window Into Past and Fodder for 2016
